description: Add Only Flag. Indicates that this reason should only be added. If an existing reason exists with the same ID, this will error instead of updating that reason.

Purchase_Item_Request_TemplateObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Purchase_Item_Request_TemplateObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Purchase_Item_Request_TemplateObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: Remove the Valid Values for this field: [field]. This field doesn't support valid values.
Submit allowed Valid Values for this field: [field]. The submitted values aren't valid for the field.
Submit valid Display Options for this field: [field]. The submitted display options aren't valid for the field.
Remove this invalid field on the worksheet template: [field].
Submit Required for the Display Options for this field: [field].

Submit the required fields for this worksheet template [template]: 
[fields]
Submit a unique order for each field in the worksheet template.
You added this type of template worksheet twice, which you can only use once: [name]. Remove 1 of the templates to maintain data integrity.
Remove the duplicate fields from this worksheet template: [template]. You can only submit the same field once for a worksheet.
Submit at least 1 of these fields for the Advanced Pricing template: End Date, Supplier Contract, Company, or Ship-To Location.

Submit the related unit of measure fields for this worksheet template: [worksheet]. 
Submit a corresponding Unit of Measure (UOM) field for each GTIN field, UPN field, or UOM attribute field. The UOM field should match the number for the other corresponding field. Example: Add the UOM 2 field for the UOM 2 Conversion Factor field, or add the UOM 4 field for the GTIN 4 field.

For alternate item identifiers on worksheets, you must submit rows for both the Alt Item Identifier field and the Alt Item Identifier Value field. Example: Submit rows for both the Alt Item Identifier 2 and Alt Item Identifier Value 2 fields.
Submit the Currency field for this worksheet template: [worksheet]. This field is required when you add pricing fields to the worksheet.

Remove supplier related fields from this worksheet template: [worksheet]. You can't submit supplier related fields on worksheets for Purchase Item Information when you already have worksheets for Supplier UOM and Pricing or Supplier Item Information in the same workbook template.

Remove the supplier item related fields for UOM and pricing from this worksheet: [worksheet]. You can't submit these fields on worksheets for Supplier Item Information when you already have worksheets for Supplier UOM and Pricing in the same workbook template.
Template type can’t be changed if it is in use.
You can't select the Item Inventory Attributes Template Type if Inventory is not enabled on the tenant.
Remove the Patient Chargeable field on the Item Inventory Site Attribute worksheet template. To submit this field, Enable Healthcare Options must be selected at the tenant-level.
Either remove the Inactive or Status field because you can't add 2 status type fields on the same worksheet template.
You must add the Default Ordering Price field when you add the Price Update Option field to the template.
Before you can add the Pricing Effective Date field, you must either add the Preferred Supplier field or Price Update Option field to the template.
You must also enter a Preferred Supplier on this worksheet template: [worksheet] when you enter a Supplier Item ID, Preferred Contract, or Supplier Default Unit Price.
You can either add the Price Update Option field or Supplier Default Unit Price field to the template.
You can't change the template type to requisition sourcing rules when the template already has configured enrichment steps.
